title: Poison Cloud Lurk for Mail From A Main
description: Throw this orb lineup to pressure Defenders at Art, as it threatens and isolates the A Site player from the Art player.

title: Default Attacker Wall for B Site From Shop
description: Throw this wall as soon as preparation phase ends for a strong default wall. This wall prevents Defenders from successfully spotting your lurk to link, and can be used to execute B Site late into the round.

title: A Site Execute Wall for Art + Orb for Dug Out
description: Enable your team to successfully take A Site with this combination of Viper utility, you can choose to position your wall closer or further away to the site.

title: B Heaven Poison Cloud Execute From Shops
description: Here's a powerful lineup you can use to enhance your B Site execute, Defenders cannot peek through the orb.

title: B Site Default Post Plant Snakebite from B Ramp
description: Here's a great post plant Snakebite lineup from B Ramp.

title: A Site Default Post Plant Snakebite from A Main
description: Here's a great post plant Snakebite lineup from A Main.

title: Start Round Art + Double Doors Pit
description: Use this extremely powerful Viper ultimate to effectively lockdown mid control. This ultimate allows your art player to play inside of it, or outside and have it act as a smoke.

title: Double Doors One Way Poison Cloud From Link
description: Throw your orb, as shown in the video, when preparation phase ends for a strong one way orb at doors.

title: Standard B Site Defender Wall to Screens
description: Here's an easy, yet effective wall you can throw at the start of the round. Use this to retake, or contest the B Site. There's a little pocket for you to hide in screens to potentially make a round winning play.

title: One Way Orb for Art Entrance From Art
description: As soon as preparation phase ends, line yourself up like so and throw your orb for a strong one way.

title: Full Utility Setup for B Site and B Link
description: Here's a very effective full utility setup for B Site and B Link

title: Simple B Site Post Plant lineup from A Link / A Main
description: Use this simple Snake Bite post plant lineup from A Link / A Main to delay enemy Defenders from defusing the Spike from a position that may be tricky for them to push into to stop you.

title: C Lobby to C Site Default Snake Bite Lineup
description: Here's a Snake Bite that you can throw from C Lobby to delay or deny the spike defuse on C Site Default.

title: B Pillars to B Site Post Plant Snake Bite
description: Here's a simple, but effective B Site Post Plant Snake Bite from B Pillars.

title: Simple A Site Post Plant Snake Bite
description: Here's a simple, but effective post plant Snake Bite lineup for A Site.

title: C Site Delay Snake Bites to Allow Rotate
description: Use this delay Snake Bites to delay enemy players from freely pushing into the areas on Site that they want to push into to give your team time to rotate and retake Site with you.

title: A, B, and C Toxic Screen + Poison Orb Chokepoint Control
description: Use this setup to control several key chokepoints throughout the map on all three Sites.

title: Standard B Site Execute Dark Cover Placements
description: Here are the default Dark Cover placements for an B Site Execute.

title: Standard C Site Execute Dark Cover Placements
description: Here are the default Dark Cover placements for an C Site Execute.

title: A Site Retake Dark Covers + Paranoia
description: Use these Dark Covers + Paranoia to either make it more difficult for the Attackers to push into A Site, or to retake Site. Callout that you are using / you want to use your Paranoia before using it so that your teammates can work off of the Paranoia and take advantage of the opportunities the Paranoia can create for your team.

title: Paranoia to Hold B, C, and Garage from Window
description: Use these Paranoia Variations to make it more difficult for enemy players to push through B, C, or C Garage.

title: C Site Retake / Site Hold Dark Covers
description: Use these C Site retake / Site Hold Dark Covers to make it more difficult for enemy players to push into and then hold Site at different stages of retaking / holding Site.

title: How to Play from A Tower
description: When playing from A Tower, use these smoke to make it more difficult for enemy players to push through key chokepoints that would allow them to take control of A Site.

title: How to play from B Tower
description: Use this simple, but effective Dark Cover + Paranoia combo to hold down B Site and make it more difficult for enemy players to push into Site.

title: Aggressive Bottom Mid Dark Covers
description: Use these aggressive bottom Mid Dark Covers to contest Mid with your team, and / or set your team up to push through market into B Site after taking control of Mid.

title: Standard A Site Dark Cover Placement + Simple Paranoia
description: Use these standard smokes when executing onto A Site, and combo it with your paranoia just before your team pushes out of A Main to create opportunities for them.

title: Standard B Site Dark Cover Placement + Simple Paranoia
description: Use these standard smokes when executing onto B Site, and combo it with your Paranoia just before your team pushes out of B Main to create opportunities for them.

title: A Site Default Smokes
description: These are two good smokes to help your team get into A Site while blocking off the other entry points into the site.

title: Mid Support / Control Dark Covers
description: Use these Dark Covers to support your team in Mid, and make it more difficult for the enemy team to contest Mid.

title: A Site Hold Dark Cover + Paranoia
description: Use this Dark Cover to delay enemy players from pushing into A Site when the enemy team is showing indicators that they are about to push into Site to give your teammates time to rotate toward the side of A.

title: B Main Dark Cover + Simple Paranoia to Hold B
description: Use this simple B Main Dark Cover and Simple Paranoia when the Attackers are executing into B Site through B Main to break up their push.

title: Early Round A Main One Way
description: Here's a simple, but effective early round A Main one way smoke that is typically used to support your teammate's efforts to control A Main.

title: B Tube to Mid Boiler Dark Cover
description: This is a good smoke to block mid boiler and allow your team to cross without being killed by an oper. This smoke is also nice because it allows you to see your opponent if they push forward and drop.

title: A Pipes to A Site Box Paranoia
description: This is a good paranoia to blind the entire right side of A Site during an A execute.

title: A Pipes to A Heaven Dark Cover
description: This is a good one way smoke to block the back side of site and allow your team to get into site during an execute.

title: Mid Blue to B Orange Dark Cover
description: This is a good dark cover to allow safe passage to B Orange and not let the opponent see you cross.
